Posts.Content: Jan 3, 2010 06:47PM Rista wrote: Hanes sells a very affordable zip front sports bra in black or white for $15.  I bought mine on the Hanes website and then 2 more from Sears.
Posts.Title: looking for sports bra recommendations?? klml4 faithfulc

Posts.Content: Jan 3, 2010 02:48AM Rista wrote: I am also on Taxotere and I had the inflamed white head bumps and red bumps all over and a lot of itchiness.  I didn't want to be seen by anyone because of how gross it looked.  My Onc. said there wasn't anything he could prescribe me and to just use OTC cortizone and baby shampoo (but after reading this post, it seems like there are things he could have prescribed!).  I have read a lot of great things about tea tree oil and how it can work magic on your skin.  I bought a bottle of it at Target and have been applying it in the evenings.  It has an instant had a cooling sensation which feels so GOOD!  The following morning I woke up and the bumps were much better.  Today, 3 days after the first use, the bumps are significantly better!  I still have some itching, but I feel and look so much better!
Posts.Title: Head Rash - Side Effect ?? CjPA Rista
